verbs.description: rocks spontaneously combust in [ARG0: woman] [V: pocket] a woman children find hamburger patty - sized rocks on a california beach they like them so she puts them in her pocket shortly afterward her pocket catches fire and she suffers serious burns orange county california capt mark stone san onofre nuclear generating station camp pendleton marine base orange county fire authority san onofre state beach
